mapper.select: SELECT reserved_price_id as id, "기간권" as pdname, CONCAT(CAST(reserved_time as char(20)),'주') as time, CONCAT(CAST(format(reserved_price,0) as char(10)), '원') as price FROM reserved_price_mst ORDER BY reserved_time

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT oneday_price_id as id, "원데이" as pdname, CONCAT(CAST(oneday_time as char(20)),'시간') as time, CONCAT(CAST(format(oneday_price,0) as char(10)), '원') as price FROM oneday_price_mst ORDER BY oneday_time Limit 1000000 ) as a
UNION ALL
